title: Propulsion Assignment
description: This assignment focuses on the basic principles of rocket propulsion and its applications.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion processes in rocket engines, including combustion efficiency.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket nozzle for a specific mission profile.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz covering basic aerodynamic principles and their applications in flight.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform a detailed analysis of subsonic and supersonic flow over an airfoil.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Evaluate aerodynamic heating effects on spacecraft during atmospheric entry.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structure to withstand launch and in-orbit operational stresses.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Solve a series of problems related to orbital mechanics and satellite trajectories.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: A comprehensive exam covering spacecraft systems engineering principles.
